about.title: About Us
about.description:
Our community is located near Iquitos, in the heart of the Amazon rainforest, where the river meets the jungle and life flows to the rhythm of nature.

We are an indigenous community that has lived in harmony with this land for generations. Through fishing, crafts, and sustainable living, we preserve the knowledge and traditions of our ancestors.

The name Kamungo Lodge comes from the Kamungo bird, a beautiful and rare species native to this region. Like the Kamungo, our community thrives in the richness of the jungle, surrounded by the sounds, colors, and rhythms of the Amazon.

We welcome with open arms those who wish to experience authentic jungle life, learn from our culture, and reconnect with nature.
